Package game

package game
Package for operating and orchestrating the game "Dungeons and Java".
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Creature
    A creature in the game.
    PlayerCharacter
    A player character in the game.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    CreatureEncounter
    Class which orchestrates a player encounter with a creature.
    DifficultyLevel
    Class which stores information of difficulty levels for the game
    Dungeon
    Class which initiates the application, Dungeons and Java.
    Encounter
    An encounter the player has throughout the game.
    Event
    Class which orchestrates the event phase of a players turn.
    Game
    A singleton class that stores the current game information.
    GameConfiguration
    Class which stores the configuration items for a game.
    Inventory
    Class which stores information about items in player's inventory
    ItemEncounter
    Class which orchestrates a player finding an item.
    MakeChoice
    Class used to interact with the player when choices are available to them.
    Monster
    Class which stores the information of monster in the dungeon.
    Move
    Class which orchestrates the movement phase of a players turn.
    NoEncounter
    Class which orchestrates actions a player may take where there is no encounter.
    Player
    Class which stores information of players of the game
    Turn
    Class which orchestrates a player's turn.
    TurnPhase
    Abstract super class for the phases of a player turn.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    Choice
    Representation of the different choices a player can make during the game.
    Item
    Representation of items in the game
